articles.title: ITV's Unforgotten set to return with new lead replacing star Nicola Walker - Mirror Online
articles.description: Popular ITV drama Unforgotten will return for a fifth series despite the death of main character DCI Cassie Stuart. Actor Nicola Walker is set to be replaced with a new lead
articles.content:
Hit ITV show Unforgotten will return despite the shock death of Nicola Walkers character with a new lead replacing her.
